item.title: Alan Bates reaches settlement over Post Office scandal
item.description: Sir Alan led a group of 555 subpostmasters who took part in a landmark group legal action against the Post Office.

item.title: Arise, Sir David - Beckham receives knighthood
item.description: Former England captain David Beckham received a knighthood at Windsor Castle for his services to football and British society.

item.title: Primark's UK sales fall as owner explores spinning off fashion retailer
item.description: ABF explores spinning off Primark chain from food brands as UK shoppers cut back on fashion purchases

item.title: Tommy Robinson cleared of terror offence after not giving police access to his phone
item.description: Robinson, whose real name is Stephen Yaxley-Lennon, was found not guilty at Westminster Magistrates' Court.

item.title: Train hero who saved passengers during attack named
item.description: The rail worker credited with saving multiple lives is named as Samir Zitouni.
